titles.title: Recognizing the Nakba and Palestinian refugees' rights.
Recognizing the Nakba and Palestinian refugees' rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
This resolution commemorates the Nakba (the uprooting, dispossession, and refugeedom of some Palestinians) through official recognition and remembrance and rejects efforts to enlist, engage, or otherwise associate the U.S. government with denial of the Nakba.
The resolution also encourages education and public understanding of the facts of the Nakba and supports the implementation of Palestinian refugees' rights as enshrined in United Nations General Assembly Resolution 194 and the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
